General.Name: Star Diamond Corp
General.Description: Star Diamond Corporation engages in the exploration, development, and production of diamonds in Canada. The company's principal mineral properties include the Star Kimberlite property and the Orion South Kimberlite property located in Fort à la Corne area of Saskatchewan, Canada. It also holds a 50% interest in the Buffalo Hills project located in north central Alberta, Canada. The company was formerly known as Shore Gold Inc. and changed its name to Star Diamond Corporation in February 2018. Star Diamond Corporation was incorporated in 1985 and is headquartered in Saskatoon, Canada.
General.Address: 600, 224 - 4th Avenue South, Saskatoon, SK, Canada, S7K 5M5
